name: Death Duel (itch)
description:
Alan has challenged Death to a duel in a last-ditch attempt to save the lives of every sentient being on Earth...

Made by 2kah

Controls:

  • Death: WASD for movement
  • Alan: Arrow keys for movement, Left click or Return or Right Ctrl for push
